verses.name: Luke 21:1
verses.text: And he looked up, and saw the rich men casting their gifts into the treasury.

verses.name: Luke 21:2
verses.text: And he saw also a certain poor widow casting in thither two mites.

verses.name: Luke 21:3
verses.text: And he said, Of a truth I say unto you, that this poor widow hath cast in more than they all:

verses.name: Luke 21:4
verses.text: For all these have of their abundance cast in unto the offerings of God: but she of her penury hath cast in all the living that she had.

verses.name: Luke 21:5
verses.text: And as some spake of the temple, how it was adorned with goodly stones and gifts, he said,
